scripts.build: npm run build:database  && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.run:frontend: cd frontend && docker run -p 3000:3000 --name ems_frontend_container ems_frontend
scripts.run:backend: cd backend && docker run -p 8000:8000 --name ems_backend_container  ems_backend
scripts.run:database: cd database && docker run -d -p 27017:27017 --name ems_mongodb_container  ems_mongodb
scripts.run: npm run run:database && npm run run:backend && npm run run:frontend
scripts.dev:database: cd database && docker run -d -p 27017:27017 --name ems_mongodb_container ems_mongodb
scripts.dev1: npm run dev:database && npm run dev:backend && npm run dev:frontend
